reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: This Activity will support improved disaster preparedness and response, and climate resilience in Fiji. It comprises a suite of interventions designed to increase the capacity of the national disaster management office (NDMO) to manage disaster awareness and response in Fiji. It will involve (a) technical assistance to the NDMO; (b) upgrade of tsumani and flood protection systems; and (c) construction of warehouses and evacuation centres.
